response.original_title: Charlotte Film Festival Shorts Programs: CHILD’S PLAY (Animated Shorts #1)
response.overview: From an ancestral house building itself and taking root to a bird-brained teenager falling for an unusually hairy girl, this collection of animated short films takes you on a delightfully diverse trip. Titles: The Little Ancestor | The Brain Bucket | 33rd & Clover | Why Are You Like This? | Snap | Phantasmagoric | Rajas & The Wolf Girl
response.title: Charlotte Film Festival Shorts Programs: CHILD’S PLAY (Animated Shorts #1)
